name: AuthConfiguration

constuctors.name: AuthConfiguration
constuctors.description: Creates an instance of the AuthConfiguration class using the specified URL for a community or a My Domain subdomain and the start URL for authenticated users.

constuctors.name: AuthConfiguration
constuctors.description: Creates an instance of the AuthConfiguration class using the specified community ID and authenticated-user starting URL.

methods.name: getAllowInternalUserLoginEnabled
methods.description: Indicates whether the community allows internal users to log in using the community login page. To enable, admins configure the setting Allow internal users to log in directly to the community on the Login & Registration page in Community Workspaces. Itâ€™s disabled by default.

methods.name: getAuthConfig
methods.description: Returns the AuthConfig sObject, which represents the authentication options for a community or Salesforce My Domain subdomain.

methods.name: getAuthConfigProviders
methods.description: Returns the list of authentication providers configured for a community or Salesforce My Domain subdomain.

methods.name: getAuthProviders
methods.description: Returns the list of authentication providers available for a community or Salesforce My Domain subdomain.

methods.name: getAuthProviderSsoUrl
methods.signature: public static String getAuthProviderSsoUrl(String communityUrl, String startUrl, String developerName)
methods.description: Returns the single sign-on URL for a community or Salesforce My Domain subdomain.

methods.name: getBackgroundColor
methods.description: Returns the color for the background of the login page for a community.

methods.name: getCertificateLoginEnabled
methods.description: Returns true if certificate-based authentication is enabled for the My Domain URL.

methods.name: getCertificateLoginUrl
methods.signature: public static String getCertificateLoginUrl(String domainUrl, String startUrl)
methods.description: Returns the certificate-based authentication endpoint for the My Domain URL if the org has certificate-based authentication enabled.

methods.name: getDefaultProfileForRegistration
methods.description: Returns the profile ID assigned to new community users.

methods.name: getFooterText
methods.description: Returns the text at the bottom of the login page for a community.

methods.name: getForgotPasswordUrl
methods.description: Returns the URL for the standard or custom Forgot Password page that is specified for a community or portal by the administrator.

methods.name: getLogoUrl
methods.description: Returns the location of the icon image at the bottom of the login page for a community.

methods.name: getRightFrameUrl
methods.description: Returns the URL for the right-frame content to display on the right side of the community login page. The admin supplies the URL.

methods.name: getSamlProviders
methods.description: Returns the list of SAML-based authentication providers available for a community or Salesforce My Domain subdomain.

methods.name: getSamlSsoUrl
methods.signature: public static String getSamlSsoUrl(String communityUrl, String startURL, String samlId)
methods.description: Returns the single sign-on URL for a community or Salesforce My Domain subdomain.

methods.name: getSelfRegistrationEnabled
methods.description: Indicates whether the current community allows new users to create their own account by filling out a registration form.

methods.name: getSelfRegistrationUrl
methods.description: Returns the location of the self-registration page for new users to sign up for an account with a community.

methods.name: getStartUrl
methods.description: Returns the start page of a community or Salesforce My Domain subdomain. This URL is the first page that users see when they log in.

methods.name: getUsernamePasswordEnabled
methods.description: Indicates whether the current community is set to display a login form asking for a username and password. You can configure the community not to request a username and password if it is for unauthenticated users or users logging in with a third-party authentication provider.

methods.name: isCommunityUsingSiteAsContainer
methods.description: Returns true if the community uses Site.com pages; otherwise, returns false.

description: Contains methods for configuring settings for
